summary: A plane explodes above the Gulf of Guinea. An escort girl is murdered in a Parisian park. Thousands of miles separate these two events, and yet Nora Chahyd, believes there's a connection ... See full summary »
cast: Rachida Brakni|André Dussollier|Thierry Frémont|Christine Boisson|Gérald Laroche|Serge Hazanavicius|Eric Savin|Jean-Michel Martial|Jean-Marie Winling|Laurent Bateau|Olivier Schneider|Élodie Navarre|Denis Podalydès|Delphine Depardieu|Paul Minthe|David Rousseau|Alaa Safi|Hervé Pierre-Gustave|Thierry Hancisse|Daniel-Jean Cassagne|Nicky Marbot|Emmanuelle Rivière|Adam Pengsawang|Martine Grémont|Nicolas Devort|Agnès Bonfillon|Pascal Le Grand|Boris Ehrgott|Michel Ferracci|Jérémie Steib|Frédéric Anscombre|Patrick Marquant|Robert Clin|Geoffrey Carey|Philippe Lesoing|Clémence Bretécher|David Tissot|Philippe Magnan|Thierry Atlan|Lena Kovski|Gigi Ledron|Marcel Mankita|Diane Pierens|Julien Sibre|Nadine Pawlikowski|François Rocquelin|Jean-François Rouzières|Cynthia Schibli|Noko|Brigitte Boréale|Sebastien Soudais
title: Une affaire d'état
